text: Sergej Milinković-Savić is Serbian professional footballer, He plays Al Hilal at Saudi Professional League and Serbia national football team at international. == Club career == On July 12, 2023, Savić transferred from Lazio to Al Hilal. == International career == On March 25, 2024, Savić scored goal against Cyprus in 7 minutes of match, results 1-0 in 2024 International friendly. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Serbian footballers Category:UEFA Euro 2024 players Category:Al Hilal SFC players
title: Sergej Milinković-Savić
